meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of a sticky, slimy substance.
meanings.sent1: The gungy mud stuck to my shoes.
meanings.sent2: The pond was gungy with algae.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped in gungy goo while hiking.
meanings.sent4: The old pipes were filled with gungy sludge.
meanings.sent5: The gungy texture of the slime made me shiver.

meanings.sent1: The car had a gungy look after the long road trip.
meanings.sent2: She tried to clean the gungy stains off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The gungy laundry pile seemed to grow overnight.
meanings.sent4: His hands were covered in gungy grease from working on the car.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen sink was clogged with gungy food scraps.

meanings.definition: To make something dirty or grimy.
meanings.sent1: Please don't gungy up the clean table with your muddy hands.
meanings.sent2: The kids managed to gungy their clothes while playing outside.
meanings.sent3: He always finds a way to gungy up the bathroom mirror.
meanings.sent4: The rainstorm gungied the streets with mud and debris.
meanings.sent5: She accidentally gungied the carpet with spilled juice.
